caption: I ordered it well done; one of the best pizzas i've had in Buffalo. I've eaten at Mustachio's for over a decade, but this is my new go-to. The homemade dough really stands out.
Delicious! The chicken fingers were remarkably good!

When I got a coupon for a new pizza place in the neighborhood, I figured I would give it a go. Ordered a cheese pizza and a single order or chicken fingers. The food looked great. The pizza was alright overall. It was cooked perfectly, with a nice crust. Not too crunchy, not too thick. I could have used a bit more flavor in the sauce, and a bit more sauce. That would have brought home the 5th star! It was still pretty good for a newer establishment. The portion on the fingers was generous. I'm a big fan of homestyle so I had to try em. I got the sweet BBQ. The sauce wasn't too sweet and had some nice tang. They were cooked perfectly, but could have been pounded down a bit. The blue cheese was a bit lackluster, but they gave us celery which is a bonus. I would definitely try eating there again.
My new favorite pizza. I didn't think that would be possible but Carnivorous on Delaware Ave is very good.. Im looking forward to trying the rest of the menu...lol

My grandma lives close by and was disappointed when she found out that tc jrs was closed untill we tried the pizza and wings from carnivorous!!! They have gained a new customer for life the pizza was great and the wings were extra crispy just how we asked... If you like a good pizza with some wings at a good price definitely check this place out!!!

My wife and I order the $30 special (we added two topping, extra) It was amazing. While the pizza and wings were being prepared, the owner and I were talking. Very friendly. I have highly recommend it to friends and family.
